Uses of LSOutput in org.apache.xml.serializer.dom3
 

Methods in org.apache.xml.serializer.dom3 with parameters of type LSOutput
 boolean LSSerializerImpl.write(Node nodeArg, LSOutput destination)
          Serializes the specified node to the specified LSOutput and returns true if the Node was successfully serialized.
 

Uses of LSOutput in org.w3c.dom.ls
 

Methods in org.w3c.dom.ls that return LSOutput
 LSOutput DOMImplementationLS.createLSOutput()
          Create a new empty output destination object where LSOutput.characterStream, LSOutput.byteStream, LSOutput.systemId, LSOutput.encoding are null.
